description: Twenty first-time-user style React prompts for blinded A/B comparison.

tasks.title: Personal Kanban board
tasks.user_prompt: Build me a tiny personal kanban board in React with three columns (Todo, Doing, Done) and cards I can move between columns.

success_criteria.text: User can add cards to Todo with validation for empty input.
User can move cards between columns with clear controls.
Board state persists across page reload using localStorage.
Shows per-column card counts and total cards.
Keyboard navigation and button labels are accessible.

tasks.title: Expense tracker
tasks.user_prompt: Create a simple expense tracker with category, amount, and date. I want to see totals and recent entries.

success_criteria.text: User can create and delete expense entries with field validation.
Displays total spend and category totals.
Entries can be sorted by date and amount.
Data persists across reloads.
Form errors and empty states are clearly shown.

tasks.title: Recipe finder
tasks.user_prompt: Make a recipe finder where I can search by name, mark favorites, and quickly see prep time.

success_criteria.text: Search filters recipes by name in real time.
User can toggle favorites per recipe.
Favorites are persisted to localStorage.
Recipe cards show prep time and difficulty.
Has a visible no-results state for search misses.

tasks.title: Habit streak dashboard
tasks.user_prompt: Build a habit streak dashboard where I can add habits and mark them done each day.

success_criteria.text: User can add/remove habits with name validation.
User can mark habit completion for today.
Current streak and longest streak are computed.
Habit data is persisted across reloads.
Dashboard includes completion summary widgets.

tasks.title: Contact manager
tasks.user_prompt: Create a contact manager with add/edit/delete, search, and favorite contacts.

success_criteria.text: User can add/edit/delete contacts with required field validation.
Search filters contacts by name or email.
User can mark contacts as favorites and filter favorites.
Contact list persists across reloads.
Empty-state guidance is shown when no contacts exist.

tasks.title: Book reading queue
tasks.user_prompt: Build a reading queue app where I can add books and track statuses: To Read, Reading, Completed.

success_criteria.text: User can add/delete books with basic validation.
Book status can be changed between queue stages.
Status summary counts are visible.
Queue persists across reloads.
Books can be filtered by status.

tasks.title: Workout planner
tasks.user_prompt: Make a workout planner with workout name, duration, and day-of-week, plus a weekly summary.

success_criteria.text: User can add and remove workouts with validation.
Workouts can be filtered by day-of-week.
Weekly total duration is computed and displayed.
Data persists across reloads.
UI has clear feedback when plan is empty.

tasks.title: Travel packing checklist
tasks.user_prompt: Build a packing checklist app where I can add items, check packed status, and filter packed vs unpacked.

success_criteria.text: User can add/delete checklist items with validation.
User can toggle packed status per item.
User can filter packed and unpacked items.
Progress summary shows packed/total counts.
List state persists across reloads.

tasks.title: Study session tracker
tasks.user_prompt: Create a study session tracker with subject, minutes, and date, then show stats for the week.

success_criteria.text: User can log and delete study sessions.
Weekly total minutes and sessions are displayed.
User can filter sessions by subject.
Sessions persist across reloads.
Form input validation and errors are shown.

tasks.title: Movie watchlist
tasks.user_prompt: Build a movie watchlist where I can add movies, rate watched ones, and filter by watched status.

success_criteria.text: User can add/delete movies with title validation.
User can mark watched and provide a rating.
Filter supports all/watched/unwatched.
Average rating of watched movies is displayed.
Watchlist persists across reloads.

tasks.title: Meal planner
tasks.user_prompt: Make a weekly meal planner with day, meal type, and dish name. I also want quick counts per day.

success_criteria.text: User can add and remove meal entries with validation.
Entries can be filtered by day and meal type.
Daily meal counts are displayed.
Plan persists across reloads.
Empty-state guidance appears when no meals are planned.

tasks.title: Job application tracker
tasks.user_prompt: Create a job application tracker with company, role, status, and follow-up date.

success_criteria.text: User can add/edit/delete applications.
Applications can be filtered by status.
Overdue follow-up items are highlighted.
Data persists across reloads.
Status summary counts are visible.

tasks.title: Subscription tracker
tasks.user_prompt: Build a subscription tracker with service name, cost, billing cycle, and next billing date.

success_criteria.text: User can add and delete subscriptions.
Monthly equivalent total cost is shown.
User can sort by cost and next billing date.
Data persists across reloads.
Past-due billing dates are visually flagged.

tasks.title: Pet care scheduler
tasks.user_prompt: Make a pet care scheduler where I track tasks like feeding, walking, and meds with due times.

success_criteria.text: User can add/delete pet care tasks with validation.
Tasks can be marked done and filtered by done status.
Upcoming vs overdue tasks are distinguished.
Schedule persists across reloads.
Summary counts for done/pending are displayed.

tasks.title: Event RSVP planner
tasks.user_prompt: Create an RSVP planner where I can add guests, track RSVP status, and meal preferences.

success_criteria.text: User can add/edit/delete guest entries.
Guest list can be filtered by RSVP status.
Meal preference counts are summarized.
Data persists across reloads.
Validation is enforced for required guest fields.

tasks.title: Bug triage board
tasks.user_prompt: Build a bug triage board with severity, status, and assignee, plus quick metrics.

success_criteria.text: User can add/edit/delete bug entries.
Entries can be filtered by severity and status.
Counts by severity and status are displayed.
Data persists across reloads.
Sorting by priority or creation order is available.

tasks.title: Home inventory list
tasks.user_prompt: Make a home inventory app to track item name, room, quantity, and replacement priority.

success_criteria.text: User can add/edit/delete inventory items.
Inventory can be filtered by room.
Low-quantity items are highlighted.
Data persists across reloads.
Priority sorting is supported.

tasks.title: Volunteer shift board
tasks.user_prompt: Create a volunteer shift board with volunteer names, shift times, and attendance check.

success_criteria.text: User can add/delete shift assignments.
Attendance can be toggled per assignment.
Shifts can be filtered by day/time block.
Data persists across reloads.
Attendance summary is visible.

tasks.title: Invoice draft manager
tasks.user_prompt: Build a draft invoice manager with client, amount, due date, and paid status.

success_criteria.text: User can add/edit/delete invoices.
Invoices can be filtered by paid/unpaid.
Overdue unpaid invoices are highlighted.
Totals for paid and unpaid amounts are shown.
Data persists across reloads.

tasks.title: Simple CRM follow-up list
tasks.user_prompt: Create a lightweight CRM follow-up list with lead name, stage, owner, and next action date.

success_criteria.text: User can add/edit/delete leads.
Leads can be filtered by stage and owner.
Upcoming and overdue follow-ups are visible.
Data persists across reloads.
Stage distribution summary is displayed.
